name: Badagent
description:
BadAgent - An agent who kills himself

You have to kill all enemies on the level with one bullet but wait there is a twist you also have to kill yourself.

How to play

  1. Move with W, A, S, D
  2. Kill all the enemies first then yourself
  3. The bullet will destroy itself within 5 bounces if nobody is killed
  4. "R" to restart "ESC" to return to main menu

Made by: PixelCg
